languages.text: "Но ты размышляла о сей возможности. Взвешивала и оценивала". {n}Губы Кибеллы кривятся в холодной усмешке.{/n} "И нашла предел своего корыстолюбия лишь в крайнем явлении ереси".

"But you did consider it. You appraised the benefit and calculated the price." {n}Kibellah's lips twist into a cold smile.{/n} "And you found the limit of your lust for profit no sooner than hitting the lowest depths of heresy."
languages.original_text: "Но ты размышляла о сей возможности. Взвешивала и оценивала". {n}Губы Кибеллы кривятся в холодной усмешке.{/n} "И нашла предел своего корыстолюбия лишь в крайнем явлении ереси".

traits.locale_text: "But you did consider it. You appraised the benefit and calculated the price." {n}Kibellah's lips twist into a cold smile.{/n} "And you found the limit of your lust for profit no sooner than hitting the lowest depths of heresy."

"But you did consider it. You appraised the benefit and calculated the price." {n}Kibellah's lips twist into a cold smile.{/n} "And you found the limit of your lust for profit no sooner than hitting the lowest depths of heresy."

languages.text: «Pero se lo planteó. Evaluó el beneficio y calculó el precio». {n}Kibellah sonríe con frialdad.{/n} «Y solo descubrió el límite de sus ansias de beneficio al descender a las mayores profundidades de la herejía».
languages.original_text: "But you did consider it. You appraised the benefit and calculated the price." {n}Kibellah's lips twist into a cold smile.{/n} "And you found the limit of your lust for profit no sooner than hitting the lowest depths of heresy."

traits.locale_text: «Pero se lo planteó. Evaluó el beneficio y calculó el precio». {n}Kibellah sonríe con frialdad.{/n} «Y solo descubrió el límite de sus ansias de beneficio al descender a las mayores profundidades de la herejía».

languages.text: 「しかし、あなたは考えはしました。あなたは利益を評価し、代償を計算しました」{n}キベラは唇を歪めて冷たい笑みを浮かべた。 {/n}「そして、あなたは異端のどん底に落ちるやいなや、利益欲の限界を見つけました」
languages.original_text: "But you did consider it. You appraised the benefit and calculated the price." {n}Kibellah's lips twist into a cold smile.{/n} "And you found the limit of your lust for profit no sooner than hitting the lowest depths of heresy."

traits.locale_text: 「しかし、あなたは考えはしました。あなたは利益を評価し、代償を計算しました」{n}キベラは唇を歪めて冷たい笑みを浮かべた。 {/n}「そして、あなたは異端のどん底に落ちるやいなや、利益欲の限界を見つけました」

languages.text: “但你确实考虑过。你评估了收益，也考虑了代价。”{n}绮贝菈嘴角扭曲着，露出了冰冷的微笑。{/n}“直到你触及到了异端邪说的最深之处，你膨胀的欲望才得到了满足。”
languages.original_text: "But you did consider it. You appraised the benefit and calculated the price." {n}Kibellah's lips twist into a cold smile.{/n} "And you found the limit of your lust for profit no sooner than hitting the lowest depths of heresy."

traits.locale_text: “但你确实考虑过。你评估了收益，也考虑了代价。”{n}绮贝菈嘴角扭曲着，露出了冰冷的微笑。{/n}“直到你触及到了异端邪说的最深之处，你膨胀的欲望才得到了满足。”

languages.text: "Aber Ihr habt darüber nachgedacht. Ihr habt die Vorteile erwogen und den Preis kalkuliert." {n}Kibellahs Lippen verziehen sich zu einem kalten Lächeln.{/n} "Und Ihr habt die Grenzen Eurer Profitgier erst in den tiefsten Tiefen der Ketzerei erreicht."
languages.original_text: "But you did consider it. You appraised the benefit and calculated the price." {n}Kibellah's lips twist into a cold smile.{/n} "And you found the limit of your lust for profit no sooner than hitting the lowest depths of heresy."

traits.locale_text: "Aber Ihr habt darüber nachgedacht. Ihr habt die Vorteile erwogen und den Preis kalkuliert." {n}Kibellahs Lippen verziehen sich zu einem kalten Lächeln.{/n} "Und Ihr habt die Grenzen Eurer Profitgier erst in den tiefsten Tiefen der Ketzerei erreicht."

languages.text: « Mais vous y avez songé. Vous avez évalué les bénéfices à la clé et calculé le prix à payer. » {n}Un sourire froid se dessine sur les lèvres de Kibellah.{/n} « Et vous n'avez trouvé les limites de votre soif de profit qu'après avoir sombré dans les profondeurs insondables de l'hérésie. »
languages.original_text: "But you did consider it. You appraised the benefit and calculated the price." {n}Kibellah's lips twist into a cold smile.{/n} "And you found the limit of your lust for profit no sooner than hitting the lowest depths of heresy."

traits.locale_text: « Mais vous y avez songé. Vous avez évalué les bénéfices à la clé et calculé le prix à payer. » {n}Un sourire froid se dessine sur les lèvres de Kibellah.{/n} « Et vous n'avez trouvé les limites de votre soif de profit qu'après avoir sombré dans les profondeurs insondables de l'hérésie. »

languages.text: "Yine de düşündün. Faydalarını ölçüp biçtin ve bedelini hesapladın." {n}Kibellah'nın dudakları bükülerek soğuk bir gülümsemeye dönüşüyor.{/n} "Sonunda kâra olan tutkunun sınırlarını keşfettin ama kâfirliğin en derinlerine hâlihazırda ulaşmıştın bile."
languages.original_text: "But you did consider it. You appraised the benefit and calculated the price." {n}Kibellah's lips twist into a cold smile.{/n} "And you found the limit of your lust for profit no sooner than hitting the lowest depths of heresy."
